title: YOLO11n Collembola Detection Model - Tiled Inference for Ultra-High-Resolution Microscope Images
description: A YOLO11n model (2.59M parameters, 5.4MB) trained for detecting collembola organisms in 10K×10K microscope images using tiled inference. Achieves 99.2% mAP@0.5, 97.8% precision, and 97.1% recall on validation data. Trained on 14,125 ImageJ ROI annotations from 20 microscope plates using 4× Quadro RTX 8000 GPUs. The model processes ultra-high-resolution images by tiling them into 1280×1280 patches with 256px overlap, then merges detections with global NMS - this approach is 2.5× better than downscaling while preserving all details.

creators.name: Zovko, Jana
creators.affiliation: University of Osijek, Department of Biology

creators.name: Hackenberger, Domagoj K.
creators.affiliation: University of Osijek, Department of Biology

notes: Model trained on collembola body annotations (without antennae and furca). Best used with confidence threshold ≥ 0.6. Requires tiled inference for images larger than 1280×1280 pixels. See MODEL_CARD.md and README.md for usage instructions.
